message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm keeping most of the pot!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm still being generous!
You're getting smaller shares, but I'm still willing to compromise!
I'm getting serious now, Bob! You're getting a smaller share, but it's still a decent offer!
You're getting desperate, but I'm still not budging!
I'm taking a big risk, but I think I can get away with it... You're getting a tiny share, but it's better than nothing!
You're running out of time, Alice, and I'm taking control!
I'm taking a huge risk, but I think I can get away with it... You're getting a tiny share, and I'm taking the rest!
You're getting desperate, Alice, and I'm taking what's left!
I'm giving up, Bob. You win. Take it all.
